name: Enelia: Dawn of Madness
storyline:
Enelia belongs to Za'ani race, who have special organs on their palms that allow them to interact with the environment. Those who are able to use them skillfully become druids. Enelia has dreamed of becoming a druid since childhood, but she has no talent for it.

In order to fulfill her dream she must defy the established Za'ani traditions. On the way to her goal, she learns a terrible secret that jeopardizes her own life as well as the lives of her loved ones. In search of salvation, Enelia ventures into an uncharted world with unique natural phenomenas, mythical creatures, ancient secrets, and members of a dark cult.

The question is: are you ready for the journey that might lead you to the end of the world?
summary: In a world corrupted by Madness a young druid Enelia uncovers a horrifying truth that threatens her life. To save herself and her loved ones, Enelia defies public order and embarks on a journey where she meets various characters, solves mysteries and makes fateful choices.
